definitions.definition: A procedure involving major incisions to remove, repair, or replace a part of a body.
definitions.example: Many times surgery is necessary to prevent cancer from spreading.

definitions.definition: The medical specialty related to the performance of surgical procedures.
A room or department where surgery is performed.

definitions.example: I dropped in on the surgery as I was passing to show the doctor my hemorrhoids.

definitions.definition: Any arrangement where people arrive and wait for an interview with certain people, particularly a politician. cf. clinic.
definitions.example: Our MP will be holding a surgery in the village hall on Tuesday.

definitions.definition: The production of a manifold by removing parts of one manifold and replacing them with corresponding parts of others.
